linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 3 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes.

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (Not Integrated)
  • DirectX: Version 10

  • Sound Card: Yes.
